metadata.title: President expresses condolences over demise of Sardar Abdul SattarÃ¢ÂÂs sister

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, June 25 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari on Wednesday expressed his condolences with Abdul Sattar Keerio over the death of his sister. The president conveyed his condolences to Abdul Sattar Keerio at his residence in Nawabshah, President Secretariat Press Wing said in a press release. The president offered Fateha for the departed soul and expressed his sympathies with the bereaved family. He said that they shared the grief of Sardar Abdul Sattar and the bereaved family.
